simple_f3.midnightconfig.title: Simple F3 Config
simple_f3.midnightconfig.auto_enable.too: Automatically enables the Simple F3 screen when entering a world.
simple_f3.midnightconfig.classic_style.t: Renders the Simple F3 screen similar to older versions of Minecraft.
simple_f3.midnightconfig.rainbow_text.to: Adds rainbow colors to the Simple F3 screen.
